other_title: ビーチクビーチ～南国乳辱撮影会～ (Japanese)
plot: Three models are on a work trip to the beach, where they will pose for several photographers, but one of the latter manages to bring out the dirty side of each of the models. Now each time they hear the camera click they get turned on. Sometimes the photo sessions with him are private, and other times they are public, since the women are now slaves to desire.
